channel.title: Django on wiseturtles's team blog
channel.description: Recent content in Django on wiseturtles's team blog

item.title: django入门
item.description: 常用命令 # 安装 $ pip install Django # 创建项目 $ django-admin startproject mysite # 创建app $ python manage.py startapp myapp # 生成migration文件 $ python manage.py makemigrations polls # 打印Sql语句 $ python manage.py sqlmigrate polls 0001 Models 创建Mod
